## What is Spark?

Unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.

- 100x faster than MapReduce
- In-memory processing
- Unified API

## Components

| Component | Use |
|-----------|-----|
| Spark Core | Base engine |
| Spark SQL | Structured data |
| MLlib | Machine learning |

slides.title: RDDs and DataFrames
slides.content:
# Core Abstractions ğŸ“Š

## RDD (Legacy)

Resilient Distributed Dataset
- Low-level API
- Immutable, distributed

## DataFrame (Preferred)

- Table-like structure
- SQL-like operations
- Optimized by Catalyst

## Example

```python_not
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("app").getOrCreate()
df = spark.read.csv("data.csv", header=True)
df.filter(df.age > 30).show()
```

> ğŸ¯ Use DataFrames for most tasks!

slides.title: Spark Operations
slides.content:
# Spark Operations ğŸ”§

## Transformations (Lazy)

- filter, map, groupBy
- Not executed until action

## Actions (Trigger)

- collect, count, show
- Trigger computation

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Transform | select, filter, join |
| Action | show, count, write |

> ğŸ’¡ Lazy evaluation optimizes execution!
